user.description:
Set up your Gardena Smart System integration.

**Step 1:** Visit the [Husqvarna Developer Console]({docs_url})
**Step 2:** Create an Application
**Step 3:** Click 'Connect an API' and select 'Gardena smart system API'
**Step 4:** Copy the Application Key and Application Secret here

**Note:** Close the Gardena app before setup!
